rows:
[Comment]

Comment post. This thread is specifying the way the software is formatting the drivers' threads.

* Picked up by the software directly from the post:
[Header]
[SplitRestaurant]
[Condo]
[Restaurants]
[Pickup]
[Deliveries]
[Itinerary]
[CompleteCondo]

**Variables**

**ThisDriverUserName** ... string, driver's block scope, from workflow spreadsheet
**ThisDriverFirstRestaurant** ... string, driver's block scope, from workflow spreadsheet
**FirstRestaurantEmoji**   ... string, calculated from workflow spreadsheet and restaurant template
**ThisDriverFirstRestaurantStartTime** ... string, driver's block scope, from workflow spreadsheet
**ThisDriverGMapURL**  ... string, driver's block scope, from workflow spreadsheet


**OnCallOpsManager**  ... structure
**.UserName** ... string, workflow spreadsheet scope, from workflow control block
**.Phone** ... string, workflow spreadsheet scope, from workflow control block
**.CompactPhone** ... string, workflow spreadsheet scope, from workflow control block, in format (510) 555.1212

**ThisDriverRestaurant.AnyOrder**  ... boolean, driver block
**ThisDriverSplitsAnyRestaurant** ... boolean, driver's block scope scope, from workflow spreadsheet
**ThisDriverAnyCondo**  ... boolean, driver's block scope scope, from workflow spreadsheet

**ThisDriverRestaurant**   list, driver's block scope
**.MemberName** ... string, from workflow spreadsheet
**.Emoji**. ... string, from workflow spreadsheet
**.Address** ... string, from workflow spreadsheet
**.Details**  ... string, from workflow spreadsheet
**.ThisDriverOrders**  ... integer, from workflow spreadsheet
**.IsSplit** ... boolean, calculated from workflow spreadsheet 
**.NoPics** ... boolean, restaurant template (i.e. if the restaurant uploads directly)
**.IsCleanup** ... boolean, from workflow control block (is it split AND is driver cleanup?)
**.TotalDrivers** ... integer, calculated from workflow spreadsheet (for this restaurant)
**.TotalOrders** ... integer, calculated from workflow spreadsheet (for this restaurant)
**.Pickup**  ... list, from workflow spreadsheet

**ThisDriverRestaurant.Pickup** ... list, driver block scope
**.Name**  ... string, from driver block
**.UserName**  ... string, from driver block
**.Normal**   ... integer, driver block
**.Veggie**   ... integer, driver block

**Consumer**  list, driver's block scope
**.Name** ... string, from workflow spreadsheet
**.UserName** ... string, from workflow spreadsheet
**.CompactPhone** ... string, from workflow spreadsheet, in format (510) 555.1212
**.CompactAltPhone** ... string, from workflow spreadsheet, in format (510) 555.1212
**.IsAltPhone** ... boolean, from workflow spreadsheet (meaning: is there an Alt phone number?)
**.City** ... string, from workflow spreadsheet
**.Address** ... string, from workflow spreadsheet
**.IsCondo** ... boolean, from workflow spreadsheet
**.Details**  ... string, from workflow spreadsheet
**.Restaurant**  ... string, from workflow spreadsheet
**.RestaurantEmoji** ... string, from workflow spreadsheet
**.Normal**  ... integer, from workflow spreadsheet
**.Veggie**  ... integer, from workflow spreadsheet

----

**Suggested changes**

----
**For v2.3**

Add:
**ThisDriverFirstRestaurantClosingTime** ... string, driver's block scope, from workflow spreadsheet
**IsFirstRestaurantClosingBefore545PM**  … Boolean, calculated from restaurant template



----
Future versions

Replace the single variables in this list:

**ThisDriverUserName** ... string, driver's block scope, from workflow spreadsheet
**ThisDriverFirstRestaurant** ... string, driver's block scope, from workflow spreadsheet
**FirstRestaurantEmoji**   ... string, calculated from workflow spreadsheet and restaurant template
**ThisDriverFirstRestaurantStartTime** ... string, driver's block scope, from workflow spreadsheet
**ThisDriverGMapURL**  ... string, driver's block scope, from workflow spreadsheet
**ThisDriverSplitsAnyRestaurant** ... boolean, driver's block scope scope, from workflow spreadsheet
**ThisDriverAnyCondo**  ... boolean, driver's block scope scope, from workflow spreadsheet

by the following structure

**Driver**  ...  struct, driver's block scope
**.UserName** ... string, from workflow spreadsheet
**.FirstRestaurant** ... string, from workflow spreadsheet
**.FirstRestaurantEmoji**   ... string, calculated from workflow spreadsheet and restaurant template
**.FirstRestaurantStartTime** ... string, driver's, calculated from from workflow spreadsheet and restaurant template
**.SplitsAnyRestaurant** ... boolean, calculated from workflow spreadsheet
**.AnyCondo**  ... boolean, calculated from workflow spreadsheet
**.GMapURL**  ... string, from workflow spreadsheet

Add:

**.AnyDelivery** ... boolean, calculated from workflow spreadsheet (any orders to deliver?)

Possibly (?) turn:

**ThisDriverSplitRestaurant**  list, driver’s block scope
**ThisDriverRestaurant**   list, driver's block scope

into:
**Driver**
**.SplitRestaurant** ... list
**.Restaurant** ... list

----

Turn:
**OnCallOpsManager**  ... structure

Into
**OnCallOpsManager**  ... list

```
[Header]

"Driver's run @"    ${ThisDriverUserName}
": start at **"  ${ThisDriverFirstRestaurant} " " ${FirstRestaurantEmoji}
" "  ${ThisDriverFirstRestaurantStartTime}  ".** "

IF ${IsFirstRestaurantClosingBefore545PM} THEN
{
  "This restaurant closes at " 
  ${ThisDriverFirstRestaurantClosingTime}  "."
}

"\n" "**Please reply to this thread when you begin your run!**\n\n

Any issue: call today's on-call ops manager,"
" @"${OnCallOpsManager.UserName}", at "${OnCallOpsManager.CompactPhone}".\n\n"

```

```
[Condo]

IF ${ThisDriverAnyCondo} THEN
{
    ":warning:You have a condo on your run: **from the previous delivery "
    "location, call condo consumer** and ask to meet downstairs. "
    "Always leave a message, & **post** if delivery fails "
     "(full instructions at the end).\n\n"
}
```

```
[CompleteCondo]

IF ${ThisDriverAnyCondo} THEN
{
    ":warning: **Complete condo instructions** "
    "(read carefully by clicking the down arrow):\n\n"

    "https://go.helpberkeley.org/t/experimental-condo-instructions/3109 \n\n"
}

"Thanks so much for taking the run, and good luck!"
```
